ffmpeg_compat.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * compatibility macros to make every ffmpeg installation appear
00003  * like the most current installation (wrapping some functionality sometimes)
00004  * it also includes all ffmpeg header files at once, no need to do it 
00005  * seperately.
00006  *
00007  * Copyright (c) 2011 Peter Schlaile
00008  *
00009  * This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify
00010  * it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
00011  * the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or
00012  * (at your option) any later version.
00013  *
00014  * This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
00015  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
00016  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
00017  * GNU General Public License for more details.
00018  *
00019  */
00020 
00021 #ifndef __FFMPEG_COMPAT_H__
00022 #define __FFMPEG_COMPAT_H__
00023 
00024 #include <libavformat/avformat.h>
00025 
00026 /* check our ffmpeg is new enough, avoids user complaints */
00027 #if (LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR < 52) || ((LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR == 52) && (LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MINOR <= 64))
00028 #  error "FFmpeg 0.7 or newer is needed, Upgrade your FFmpeg or disable it"
00029 #endif
00030 /* end sanity check */
00031 
00032 
00033 #include <libavcodec/avcodec.h>
00034 #include <libavutil/rational.h>
00035 #include <libavutil/opt.h>
00036 
00037 #if (LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR > 52) || ((LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MAJOR >= 52) && (LIBAVFORMAT_VERSION_MINOR >= 101))
00038 #define FFMPEG_HAVE_PARSE_UTILS 1
00039 #include <libavutil/parseutils.h>
00040 #endif

00042 #include <libswscale/swscale.h>
00043 #include <libavcodec/opt.h>

00046 #define FFMPEG_HAVE_AVIO 1
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #if (LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR > 53) || ((LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR == 53) && (LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MINOR > 1)) || ((LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR == 53) && (LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MINOR == 1) && (LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MICRO >= 1)) || ((LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR == 52) && (LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MINOR >= 121))
00050 #define FFMPEG_HAVE_DEFAULT_VAL_UNION 1

00079 #ifndef FFMPEG_HAVE_AVIO
00080 #define AVIO_FLAG_WRITE URL_WRONLY
00081 #define avio_open url_fopen
00082 #define avio_tell url_ftell
00083 #define avio_close url_fclose
00084 #define avio_size url_fsize
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 /* there are some version inbetween, which have avio_... functions but no
00088    AVIO_FLAG_... */

00090 #define AVIO_FLAG_WRITE URL_WRONLY
00091 #endif

00122 #ifndef FFMPEG_HAVE_DECODE_AUDIO3
00123 static inline 
00124 int avcodec_decode_audio3(AVCodecContext *avctx, int16_t *samples,
00125               int *frame_size_ptr, AVPacket *avpkt)
00126 {
00127     return avcodec_decode_audio2(avctx, samples,
00128                      frame_size_ptr, avpkt->data,
00129                      avpkt->size);
00130 }
00131 #endif
00132 
00133 #ifndef FFMPEG_HAVE_DECODE_VIDEO2
00134 static inline
00135 int avcodec_decode_video2(AVCodecContext *avctx, AVFrame *picture,
00136                          int *got_picture_ptr,
00137                          AVPacket *avpkt)
00138 {
00139     return avcodec_decode_video(avctx, picture, got_picture_ptr,
00140                     avpkt->data, avpkt->size);
00141 }
00142 #endif
00143 
00144 static inline
00145 int64_t av_get_pts_from_frame(AVFormatContext *avctx, AVFrame * picture)
00146 {
00147     int64_t pts = picture->pkt_pts;
00148 
00149     if (pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00150         pts = picture->pkt_dts;
00151     }
00152     if (pts == AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00153         pts = 0;
00154     }
00155 
00156     (void)avctx;
00157     return pts;
00158 }
00159 
00160 #endif
